Cloths' Style Development Kit

This provides internal functionalities to develop custom Style. See built-in styles to know how to use each functionalities.

Types

Cloth = object
  style*: Style = nil
  data*: Data = nil

Data = ref object
  case isString*: bool
  of true:
      str*: string

  of false:
      subitems*: seq[Cloth]

  
Iterator = object
  
Style = ref object of RootObj

Consts

constant: Style = nil

Procs

proc apply(cloth: Cloth): Data {....raises: [Exception], tags: [RootEffect],
                                 forbids: [].}
proc cloth(data: Data): Cloth {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc cloth(str: string): Cloth {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc cloth_lowlevel(style: Style; data: Data): Cloth {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
proc cloth_lowlevel(style: Style; str: string): Cloth {....raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
proc data(str: string): Data {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc data(subitems: varargs[Cloth]): Data {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc len(data: Data): int {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc newIterator(data: Data): Iterator {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc next(iter: var Iterator): ptr string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
proc whitespace(length: Natural): string {....raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}

    forbids: [].}
